qas.question: VH1 declared what song the "Greatest song of the 2000s?"
How many Grammy awards did "Crazy in Love" win?
How many did Crazy in Love sell to become one of the greatest selling singles in history?
What type of organism was named after Beyonce in 2012?
A place for Beyonce in the Rock and Roll Hall of fame was awarded when?
Which of Beyonce's songs was called Greatest Song of the 2000s?
How many Grammy awards did Crazy in Love get?
How many copies did Crazy in Love sell?
Who released the single Girls Love Beyonce?
Which publication considers Crazy in Love to be one of the top 500 songs of all time?
What did Bryan Lessard name after Beyoncé?

context: Her debut single, "<a0_0><a5_0>Crazy in Love<a5_0/><a0_0/>" was named VH1's "Greatest Song of the 2000s", NME's "Best Track of the 00s" and "Pop Song of the Century", considered by <a9_0>Rolling Stone<a9_0/> to be one of the 500 greatest songs of all time, <a6_0>earned <a1_0>two<a1_0/> Grammy Awards<a6_0/> and is one of the best-selling singles of all time at <a7_0>around <a2_0>8 million<a2_0/> copies<a7_0/>. The music video for "Single Ladies (Put a Ring on It)", which achieved fame for its intricate choreography and its deployment of jazz hands, was credited by the Toronto Star as having started the "first major dance craze of both the new millennium and the Internet", triggering a number of parodies of the dance choreography and a legion of amateur imitators on YouTube. In 2013, <a8_0><a10_0>Drake<a10_0/><a8_0/> released a single titled "Girls Love Beyoncé", which featured an interpolation from Destiny Child's "Say My Name" and discussed his relationship with women. In January 2012, research scientist Bryan Lessard named Scaptia beyonceae, <a11_0>a species of horse <a3_0>fly<a11_0/><a3_0/> found in Northern Queensland, Australia after Beyoncé due to the fly's unique golden hairs on its abdomen. In <a4_0>July 2014<a4_0/>, a Beyoncé exhibit was introduced into the "Legends of Rock" section of the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame. The black leotard from the "Single Ladies" video and her outfit from the Super Bowl half time performance are among several pieces housed at the museum.
